snippet.title: Nuclear Throne Ultra - Update 30
snippet.description:
Link to the mod: https://erdeppol.itch.io/nuclear-throne-ultra-mod
To play Nuclear Throne Ultra Mod you need to own Nuclear Throne: https://store.steampowered.com/app/242680/Nuclear_Throne/

This update adds a whole lot of stuff most significantly:
- 60FPS
- Daily/Weekly leaderboard
- Character redesigns and voices
- Gamemode Concoctions
- Multi Crown
- New Areas
- New Bosses
- New Weapons
- New Gamemodes
- New Crowns

Changelog:
https://erdeppol.itch.io/nuclear-throne-ultra-mod/devlog/657040/nuclear-throne-ultra-mod-update-30

Link to the Ultra Mod discord for bug reporting and feedback: https://discord.gg/kmp5t2TK6j
Or feel free to post your videos and/or custom survival arenas there.

I will continue to update Ultra Mod with future balance patches and bugfixes, so make sure you connect via steam to see if there are any updates.

To participate in the weekly/daily you need a steam account and have steam open when you boot up the game.

Music used:
The Deep End by Larje100
Forest Songs (in reverse) by David Fenn

Ultra Mod F.A.Q.
https://erdeppol.itch.io/nuclear-throne-ultra-mod
